summary: The diff addresses all three requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3) related to fixing the maximum call stack size exceeded error. Changes include: (1) scoped query invalidation with exact:true flag in React Query hooks to prevent cascading refetches, (2) increased staleTime to 30 seconds and disabled automatic refetching on mount/focus, (3) refactored TeamDetailPage to use stable primitive dependencies in useMemo hooks instead of object references. Backend changes appear to be a migration module that is unrelated to the frontend stack overflow issue.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend migration module (backend/migration.mo) that provides data migration functionality between old and new actor states
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states 'Non-goals: Adding new features; Changing the UI design or layout; Modifying backend data models'. The migration module appears to be new infrastructure not requested in the fix requirements.
